summary: Just some numbers in SkyrimPrefs.ini to write:)
descriptionHtml:
Go to ... Documents/my games/skyrim/SkyrimPrefs.ini ... find ... fShadowBiasScale ...
write ... fShadowBiasScale=20.0000 ... PROFIT!

You can try another condition for that option, in my game it works perfectly.

Maybe you'll need to write in CONSOLE in main menu before download you save REFRESHINI then ENTER.

No file needed:)
author: Zalntar
